parameters.name: membershipIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the membership.

parameters.name: queryLogStatus
parameters.description: An indicator as to whether query logging has been enabled or disabled for the membership. When ENABLED, Clean Rooms logs details about queries run within this collaboration and those logs can be viewed in Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The default value is DISABLED.

parameters.name: jobLogStatus
parameters.description: An indicator as to whether job logging has been enabled or disabled for the collaboration. When ENABLED, Clean Rooms logs details about jobs run within this collaboration and those logs can be viewed in Amazon CloudWatch Logs. The default value is DISABLED.

parameters.name: defaultResultConfiguration
parameters.description: The default protected query result configuration as specified by the member who can receive results. Configuration for protected query results. s3 (dict) --- Contains the configuration to write the query results to S3. Intended file format of the result. The S3 bucket to unload the protected query results. keyPrefix (string) --- The S3 prefix to unload the protected query results. singleFileOutput (boolean) --- Indicates whether files should be output as a single file ( TRUE) or output as multiple files ( FALSE). This parameter is only supported for analyses with the Spark analytics engine. roleArn (string) --- The unique ARN for an IAM role that is used by Clean Rooms to write protected query results to the result location, given by the member who can receive results.

nested_params.name: s3
nested_params.description: Contains the configuration to write the query results to S3.

nested_params.name: resultFormat
nested_params.description: Intended file format of the result.

nested_params.name: bucket
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket to unload the protected query results.

nested_params.name: keyPrefix
nested_params.description: The S3 prefix to unload the protected query results.

nested_params.name: singleFileOutput
nested_params.description: Indicates whether files should be output as a single file ( TRUE) or output as multiple files ( FALSE). This parameter is only supported for analyses with the Spark analytics engine.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The unique ARN for an IAM role that is used by Clean Rooms to write protected query results to the result location, given by the member who can receive results.

parameters.name: defaultJobResultConfiguration
parameters.description: The default job result configuration. The output configuration for a protected job result. s3 (dict) --- Contains the configuration to write the job results to S3. The S3 bucket for job output. keyPrefix (string) --- The S3 prefix to unload the protected job results. The unique ARN for an IAM role that is used by Clean Rooms to write protected job results to the result location, given by the member who can receive results.

nested_params.name: outputConfiguration
nested_params.description: The output configuration for a protected job result.

nested_params.name: s3
nested_params.description: Contains the configuration to write the job results to S3.

nested_params.name: bucket
nested_params.description: The S3 bucket for job output.

nested_params.name: keyPrefix
nested_params.description: The S3 prefix to unload the protected job results.

nested_params.name: roleArn
nested_params.description: The unique ARN for an IAM role that is used by Clean Rooms to write protected job results to the result location, given by the member who can receive results.

nested_items.name: membership
nested_items.description: The membership object.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique ID of the membership.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the membership.

nested_items.name: collaborationArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for the membership's associated collaboration.

nested_items.name: collaborationId
nested_items.description: The unique ID for the membership's collaboration.

nested_items.name: collaborationCreatorAccountId
nested_items.description: The identifier used to reference members of the collaboration. Currently only supports Amazon Web Services account ID.

nested_items.name: collaborationCreatorDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the collaboration creator.

nested_items.name: collaborationName
nested_items.description: The name of the membership's collaboration.

nested_items.name: createTime
nested_items.description: The time when the membership was created.

nested_items.name: updateTime
nested_items.description: The time the membership metadata was last updated.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the membership.

nested_items.name: memberAbilities
nested_items.description: The abilities granted to the collaboration member.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: mlMemberAbilities
nested_items.description: Specifies the ML member abilities that are granted to a collaboration member.

nested_items.name: customMLMemberAbilities
nested_items.description: The custom ML member abilities for a collaboration member.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: queryLogStatus
nested_items.description: An indicator as to whether query logging has been enabled or disabled for the membership.

nested_items.description: An indicator as to whether job logging has been enabled or disabled for the collaboration.

nested_items.description: The S3 prefix to unload the protected query results.

nested_items.name: singleFileOutput
nested_items.description: Indicates whether files should be output as a single file ( TRUE) or output as multiple files ( FALSE). This parameter is only supported for analyses with the Spark analytics engine.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: The unique ARN for an IAM role that is used by Clean Rooms to write protected query results to the result location, given by the member who can receive results.

nested_items.name: paymentConfiguration
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the collaboration member.

nested_items.name: queryCompute
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the collaboration member for query compute costs.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration member has accepted to pay for query compute costs ( TRUE) or has not accepted to pay for query compute costs ( FALSE).
If you set the value to FALSE but you are responsible to pay for query compute costs.
If you set the value to TRUE but you are not responsible to pay for query compute costs.

nested_items.name: machineLearning
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the collaboration member for machine learning costs.

nested_items.name: modelTraining
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the member for model training.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration member has accepted to pay for model training costs ( TRUE) or has not accepted to pay for model training costs ( FALSE).
If you set the value to FALSE but you are responsible to pay for model training costs.
If you set the value to TRUE but you are not responsible to pay for model training costs.

nested_items.name: modelInference
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the member for model inference.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration member has accepted to pay for model inference costs ( TRUE) or has not accepted to pay for model inference costs ( FALSE).
If you set the value to FALSE but you are responsible to pay for model inference costs.
If you set the value to TRUE but you are not responsible to pay for model inference costs.

nested_items.name: jobCompute
nested_items.description: The payment responsibilities accepted by the collaboration member for job compute costs.

nested_items.name: isResponsible
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the collaboration member has accepted to pay for job compute costs ( TRUE) or has not accepted to pay for query and job compute costs ( FALSE).
If you set the value to FALSE but you are responsible to pay for query and job compute costs.
If you set the value to TRUE but you are not responsible to pay for query and job compute costs.
